# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

The buffer for a given semantic. There can only be one buffer for any given ID.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript<S>(semantic: S) -> MeshBuffer<S.Element>? where S : MeshBufferSemantic { get set }
```
